did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Notes, announcements, brochures, and publications from gay rights and AIDS organizations in Binghamton, Ithaca, and nationally.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Notes, announcements, brochures, and publications from gay rights and AIDS organizations in Binghamton, Ithaca, and nationally.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: John W. Hollister papers, #7685. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
